pr_body:
https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-834

This PR implements HMS Core ML Kit Face detection in place of Google ML Kit Face detection when a phone with Huawei Mobile Services is used. This functionality was tested manually as it is not yet possible to test this functionality automatically. The tests were done on a Huawei P40 and a OnePlus N10. 

### Your checklist for this pull request
Please review the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/blob/develop/README.md) and [wiki pages](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/wiki/) of this repository.

https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-960

Because of changes made in https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-958 the coordinate translation 
is not the same as in the FaceAndTextDetector class and therefore the function was kept in the class. 
Tested on a OnePlus N10

https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-839

Updated Google ML Kit versions in build.gradle
Added Google Pose detection to FaceAndTextDetector.kt and renamed it to FaceTextPoseDetector.kt
Refactored face and text detection to make it more readable.

Automated testing is not yet possible for this feature. 
Manual testing of pose in comibination with face and text detection was done on a OnePlus N10 and a Xiaomi Mi Mix 2.

pr_title: CATROID-1035 FileNotFoundException when duplicate delete look in clone
pr_body:
https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-1035

Deleting a look in a clone now only removes the look from the lookslist of the clone and doesn't delete the lookfile. 
When a look is deleted in an original sprite the look is also removed from the looklist and the lookfile is flagged and is deleted when the Stage lifecycle ends. 

### Your checklist for this pull request
Please review the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/blob/develop/README.md) and [wiki pages](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/wiki/) of this repository.

pr_review_comments:
[{'comment_id': 666003057, 'comment_body': 'Shouldn't "delete look" work also for clones? :thinking: 
I.e. there is an event-brick "When you start as a clone" and in combination with this "delete look" brick it won't work.
I suggest using https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/kotlin.collections/-mutable-set/ to solve this problem.

@wslany How was this intended to work with clones? :thinking: 

Also, please clean the rest of the function there is a local value lookData (using ?: return null => non-nullable)', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 8, 8, 56, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 666007026, 'comment_body': 'This makes me think, is there a test that guarantees that the look was deleted? :thinking: 
If not please add one (Unit Test)', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 8, 9, 1, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 666021772, 'comment_body': 'As discussed, please write a cleanup method that executes during the project load to avoid unused files if the stage activity crashes.
```suggestion
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 8, 9, 21, 26, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675430027, 'comment_body': 'Does it need to be a singleton?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 33, 3, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675430834, 'comment_body': 'Hmm, maybe add the filename and the exception message', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 34, 40, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675434873, 'comment_body': 'Please use https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/kotlin.collections/flat-map.html and https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/kotlin.collections/map.html instead :)
Or maybe you find something better here: https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/kotlin.collections/', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 41, 50, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675436573, 'comment_body': 'Please use https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/kotlin.collections/filter.html and https://kotlinlang.org/api/latest/jvm/stdlib/kotlin.collections/for-each.html', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 44, 10, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675445014, 'comment_body': "Nice :)
But, if you dependency-inject the directory, you could mock them in the test and you wouldn't have to create new files ;)", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 52, 53, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675447120, 'comment_body': 'Please use assert array equals or something similar instead.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 54, 55, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675449085, 'comment_body': 'This file is much better now, thanks!', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 9, 57, 32, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675451878, 'comment_body': 'Please make cleanUpUnusedLookFiles thread-safe ;)', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 10, 2, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675457057, 'comment_body': "Since we don't have to test if StorageOperations.deleteFile(file) really deletes a file,
consider Mockito to test your implementation :)", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 10, 11, 9, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 675464334, 'comment_body': 'Please consider using a parameterized Test and add more examples :) ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 23, 10, 24, 10, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}]
